remarks: Define the function which takes a topology and returns the path homotopy relation on that topology.  Definition of [Hatcher] p. 25.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jun-2014.)
statement:
df-phtpc $p |- ~=ph = ( x e. Top |-> { <. f , g >. | ( { f , g } C_ ( II Cn x ) /\ ( f ( PHtpy ` x ) g ) =/= (/) ) } ) $.
$d f g x $.
